Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2007 04:02PM MistyW wrote: Thank you Cozy for your input. I hope that we find out some good news on May 2nd. My sisters and I have our fingers crossed that all will go well. I am scheduled for my mammogram on the 27th. The surgeon said that my sisters and I have to start getting them every year now. My mother's sister died 3 years ago with bc. She had the worst kind of bc. I am 36 yrs. old and have a sister that is 40 and another that is 35. Thanks for your prayers.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed Idamaria Idamaria
